The Major Tones the debut feature of of #IngridPokropek will will be part of the Ibero American Jury Competition at the SIFF 2024. SIFF 2024 #IberoAmerican #cinema is nurtured by #diversity, unique histories, and a rich #tradition of #storytelling. Allow the #powerful ##documentaries and works of fiction in this program to ignite your #emotions and #expand your #imagination.

Watch Live! 6/6 at 5 p.m. | The Accidental Geographer S4 E5: Sukanya Chakrabarti, Associate Professor Dept of Film and Theatre: The latest episode of the Accidental Geographer features Sukanya Chakrabarti, a professor in department of film and theater. The two will discuss her intellectual journey, the fantastic work happening at the intersection of theater and film, and the way in which we think about identities in everyday life.

Im just baffled how testimonials like this, from a Black African refugee, would be entirely ingored by the anti-racist movement? Same goes for all of the other social and civil rights activism in the US. Dont let the mob mentality turn you into hypocrites. Take the time to learn the truth about israel. Dont be lazy and rely on hateful echo chambers.
